sentences.en: a lot of guys out for &B{a night on the town}.
sentences.cn: 很多夜间外出寻欢作乐的人。

sentences.en: Altogether, it was a delightful town garden, peaceful and secluded.
sentences.cn: 总体上说，这是个令人愉快的城市花园，宁静而偏僻。

sentences.en: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.cn: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.en: As he talked, an airforce jet screamed over the town.
sentences.cn: 他谈话时，一架军用喷气式飞机在镇子上空呼啸而过。

sentences.en: Distantly, to her right, she could make out the town of Chiffa.
sentences.cn: 在她右边，远远的，她依稀能辨认出希法镇。

sentences.en: From Wrexham centre take the Chester Road to the outskirts of town.
sentences.cn: 从雷克瑟姆市中心出发，沿着切斯特路到达市郊。

sentences.en: I never go on the bus into the town.
sentences.cn: 我从不坐公共汽车去城里。

sentences.en: I thought I'd &B{go to town on} the redecoration.
sentences.cn: 我原想我会不遗余力地进行再装修。

sentences.en: I walked to the nearest town.
Of course, slap-bang in the middle of town the rents are high.
sentences.cn: 当然啦，市区正中心的租金是很高的。

sentences.en: The Afghan air force was using helicopters to supply the besieged town.
sentences.cn: 阿富汗空军正用直升机向被围城镇提供补给。

sentences.en: The car pulled in and double-parked in front of the town hall.
sentences.cn: 车在市政大厅前靠边并排停下了。

sentences.en: The fighting has been centred around the town of Vucovar.
sentences.cn: 战斗主要集中在武科瓦尔镇周围。

sentences.en: The new town would have been unrecognisable to the original inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 原来的居民可能会认不出这个崭新的城镇了。

sentences.en: The president traveled by rail to his home town.
sentences.cn: 总统坐火车回到了他的家乡。

sentences.en: The town itself was full of life and character.
sentences.cn: 这个城市本身充满活力，个性十足。

sentences.en: The town of whitby was immortalised in Bram Stoker's famous Dracula story.
sentences.cn: 惠特比镇因为布拉姆·斯托克著名的吸血鬼故事而名传后世。

sentences.en: The town's old quayside is collapsing after years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 镇上老码头区多年来疏于维护,快要塌陷了.

sentences.en: Town gardens are ideal because they produce flowers nearly all year round.
sentences.cn: 城市公园是理想去处，那里几乎一年四季鲜花盛开。

phrases.tran_cn: 开普敦（等于Capetown，南非西南部港市）
(非正式)彻底地（或热忱地，铺张地）做某事
(非正式)作乐（尤指享受城镇的夜生活）
积极地寻求镇或城市的娱乐活动
adj. 不在城里；出门，室外
市中心；镇上的主要商业区
市政厅；市政府；市民集会所
（主要居住在乡间者的）市内宅邸；市政府；美国市内二层楼或三层楼多栋联建住宅
n. 城镇规划；都市规划（等于city planning）
城市广场（马六甲的一个广场）；城镇广场（拉斯维加斯一个综合性商业中心）

trans.tran_cn: 城镇，市镇，小村庄，城镇居民，商业中心
trans.tran_en: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village
